title: Templates (Global)
description: Templates will be premade examples based on policy. They will show only when the type is selected so only applicable templates are shown.
feedbackSummary: Any plans to add functionality to generate Ch. 12 formatted products?

title: Templates (Unit)
description: Allow the same concept as global templates but for unit. This will be rendered based on the unit selected for the header.

title: MEMORANDUMS Type
description: A memorandum provides a less formal way to correspond within an activity/command.  Subordinates within that activity or command may use a memorandum to correspond directly with each other on routine official business or as an informal means of communication.
feedbackSummary: Used to ensure all types are added.

title: BUSINESS LETTERS type
description: Use the business letter to correspond with agencies, businesses, or individuals outside DoD, who are unfamiliar with the standard letter.  It also may be used for official correspondence between individuals within DoD, when the occasion calls for a personal approach.
feedbackSummary: To ensure we have all types
